DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of this study are to evaluate the effects of VX-770 on Midazolam and Rosiglitazone, and the effect of Fluconazole on VX-770.
DOC.brief_title: Study of VX-770 on Midazolam and Rosiglitazone and the Effect of Fluconazole on VX-770
DOC.criteria: Subjects must be male or female and between 18 and 55 years of age. Subjects must be judged to be in good health. Subjects must have a body mass index (BMI) from 18 to 30 kg/m2. History of any illness that, in the opinion of the investigator or the subject's general practitioner, might confound the results of the study or pose an additional risk in administering study drug(s) to the subject. Subjects who have human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), hepatitis C, or active hepatitis B. Female subjects and female partner(s) of male subjects who are pregnant, nursing, or planning to become pregnant during the study or within 90 days of the last dose of study drug. History of cardiovascular disease, hypoglycemia, or edema.
